content: dog eyeglass holder by ann fellerman materials worsted weight yarn size g 4 00 mm crochet hook stitch marker yarn needle scissor abbreviations chain - chain scdec - single_crochet decrease single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch scinc - single_crochet increase base - with main color slip knot chain 19 round 1 single_crochet into second chain from hook 16sc 3sc in the same stitch 16sc scinc in the same chain you crocheted the first single_crochet slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 38 st round 2 scinc 16sc scinc 3 times 16sc scinc 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 44 st round 3 single_crochet scinc 16sc single_crochet scinc 3 times 16sc single_crochet scinc 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 50 st round 4 2sc scinc 16sc 2sc scinc 3 times 16sc 2sc scinc 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 56 st round 5 3sc scinc 16sc 3sc scinc 3 times 16sc 3sc scinc 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 62 st round 6 4sc scinc 16sc 4sc scinc 3 times 16sc 4sc scinc 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch 68 st fasten_off and secure ends using a stitch marker mark the stitch in the middle of the oval in the last row with back side up insert the hook in the stitch 5 to the left of your marked stitch row 1 59sc 9 stitches not worked turn row 2 slip_stitch around the 63 stitches from row 1 fasten_off muzzle - with white round 1 single_crochet into second chain from hook 2sc 3sc in the last chain on opposite side of chain 2sc 2sc in the same chain you crocheted the first single_crochet slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 10 st round 2 scinc 2sc increase 3 times 2sc scinc twice slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 16 st round 3 scinc twice 2sc increase 6 times 2sc scinc 4 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 28 st round 4 - 5 single_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 6 scdec twice 2sc scdec 6 times 2sc scdec 4 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 16 st round 7 scdec 2sc scdec 3 times 2sc scdec twice slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn 10 st fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff lightly and close shape muzzle by winding yarn through center and around bottom pulling tight sew muzzle to the 9 skipped stitches from round 6 of the base using a stitch marker mark the stitch in the middle of the oval in the last row opposite the muzzle ears -
